TopicTitle: Is it possible to edit Extraplanetery launchpad deposit locations?

Articles.Content: I built a Extraplanetery Base, next to my Kethane base, but there wasn't any Ore there, but I borked up and didn't realized there would be a requirement, could I alter the Hexes which have ore so I can not have to Lug Ore across a third of the Planet?
There's a debugger tool that exists somewhere for that. Check the kethane thread.
I have the Debug, but I couldn't find anything for it.
